JUSTICE SOPHY THOMAS THURSDAY, THE 1174 DAY OF JANUARY 2024 / 21ST POUSHA, 1945 CRL.MC NO. 287 OF 2024 CRIME NO.354/2007 OF Aranmula Police Station, Pathanamthitta AGAINST THE ORDER/JUDGMENT LP 83/2013 OF JUDICIAL MAGISTRATE OF FIRST CLASS -I,PATHANAMTHITTA PETITIONER/ACCUSED: JOLY MATHEW AGED 39 YEARS S/O SULOCHANAN, CHAKKIZHEETHU HOUSE, KIDANGANNOOR P.O, PATHANAMTHITTA DISTRICT, PIN - 689514 BY ADVS. K.S. PRAVEEN M.I.MOHAMMED RAFFI RESPONDENT/COMPLAINANT: STATE OF KERALA REPRESENTED BY THE PUBLIC PROSECUTOR, HIGH COURT OF KERALA, ERNAKULAM, PIN - 682031 SR.PP-SRI.VIPIN NARAYAN THIS CRIMINAL MISC. CASE HAVING COME UP FOR ADMISSION ON 11.01.2024, THE COURT ON THE SAME DAY PASSED THE FOLLOWING: 2024/KER/1859 Crl.M.C.No.287/2024 ; SOPHY THOMAS, J Cri.IM.C.Mo.287 of 2024 Dated this the 11" day of January, 2024 ORDER This Crl.M.C. under Section 482 of CrPC is filed by the sole accused in Crime No.354/2007 of Aranmula Police Station, Pathanamthitta District, which is now pending before the Judicial Magistrate of First Class-l, Pathanamthitta, as LP No.83/2013, for a direction to the learned Magistrate, to consider his bail application on the date of surrender itself. 2. Learned counsel for the petitioner would submit that, the petitioner was abroad and so he could not appear before the Court in time. The crime is of the year 2007 and his case was transferred to LP register in the year 2013. Even then, since his limited prayer is only to consider his bail application on the date of surrender itself, this Crl.M.C. can be allowed. In the result, the Crl.M.C. is also allowed as follows: The petitioner is at liberty to surrender before the Judicial Magistrate of First Class-l, Pathanamthitta, in LP No.83/2013, Bata apes 2024/KER/1859 Crl.M.C.No.287/2024 on any day, before 30.01.2024. Learned Magistrate has to consider his bail application on the date of surrender itself, as far as possible, and pass appropriate orders. The arrest warrant pending against him shall be kept in abeyance, till 30.01.2024.
